verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Gloria, gloria, gloria, newline Gloria in excelsis Deo, newline In excelsis Deo. newline Gloria, gloria, gloria, newline Gloria in excelsis Deo. newline Gloria, gloria newline In excelsis Deo. newline Gloria in excelsis, newline Gloria in excelsis Deo. newline Gloria in excelsis Deo, newline In excelsis. newline gloria in excelsis Deo.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: Glorious, glorious, glorious, newline Glorious, all glory be to God, newline Glory in the highest. newline Glorious, glorious, glorious, newline Glory be to God on high, glory. newline Glorious, glorious, newline Glory in the highest, glory. newline Glory to God in heaven, newline Glory to God in heaven, glory. newline Glory to God in heaven, glory. newline He is glorious! Glorious, newline Glory in the highest.
